name: Thomas vs friends
description:
SUPER MEGA PLOT

For some reason, Thomas's friends want to kill Thomas. You will help Thomas to make the right decisions so he can survive.

This game is a parody and contains alot of swear words. (don't make Youtube cry)

BONUS

Arrive at day 50 to get a megaprize.
Arrive at day 100 to get a megaprize.
